changeStatus.description: Change the status of the thread
changeStatus.notAThread: Sorry, this is not a thread!
changeStatus.error: An error occurred while updating the status.

convertTime.timeOption: Enter the time to convert (HH:MM format)
convertTime.invalidTimeFormat: Please provide a valid time in HH:MM format.
convertTime.noConversionNeeded: No conversion needed! The time in {{timeZone}} is {{time}}.

prTemplate.description: Send a formatted PR review request
prTemplate.channelOption: Select a channel for the PR review request

modal.channelNotFound: ‚ùå The channel you are trying to access was not found.
modal.noPermissions: ‚ùå I don't have permission to send messages in that channel.

requestPoint.description: Request a point in this thread
requestPoint.notAThread: Sorry, this is not a thread!
requestPoint.message: {{userId}} is asking for a point for **{{reason}}**. Check the message here: {{threadLink}}
requestPoint.success: Your request has been sent successfully.
requestPoint.error: An error occurred while submitting your request. Please try again later.

searchMyPoints.description: Get the Discord search query to check points for a specific month
searchMyPoints.channelsOption: Enter one or more channels (comma-separated, Ex: novabot,code-review)
searchMyPoints.reply:
Here are your search queries:

**PRs opened:**
```
{{openedPRs}}
```

**Tasks completed:**
```
{{taskCompletedQuery}}
```

**Points obtained:**
```
{{addPointQuery}}
```

**Boosted Points obtained:**
```
{{boostedPointQuery}}
```

sendMessage.description: Send a message with the bot

modal.channelNotFound: ‚ùå The channel you are trying to access was not found.
modal.noPermissions: ‚ùå I don't have permission to send messages in that channel.
modal.postSuccess: ‚úÖ The announcement has been successfully posted in {{channel}}!

server.reply: This server is {{serverName}} and has {{memberCount}} members.

user.reply: This command was run by {{username}}, who joined on {{joinedAt}}.

votePoints.description: Start an Effort Estimation Points voting for the current thread.
votePoints.pollQuestion: How much does this task cost? Point Type: {{pointType}} | {{userId}}
votePoints.pointDescription: Select the type of points to award
votePoints.invalidResult: The result was not valid or no points were awarded.
votePoints.errorOcurred: An error occurred while processing the poll result.

calendarSchedules.errorMissingParameters: Error: Missing one or more required parameters (client, event, event.start.dateTime, or timeZone).
calendarSchedules.errorChannelNotFound: Channel not found or client not ready.
calendarSchedules.errorInvalidEventsArray: Error: Missing or invalid parameters (events array).

messageSchedules.errorMissingParameters: Error: Missing one or more required parameters (client, channel, message, datetime, or timeZone).
messageSchedules.errorChannelNotFound: Channel not found or client not ready.

checkReview.description: Check for PRs that need code reviews
checkReview.channelOption: Select the channel to check for PRs
checkReview.invalidChannel: The selected channel is not valid. Please select a text channel or thread.
checkReview.noPendingReviews: There are no PRs in 'request-review' status that need reminders in channel {{channelName}}.
checkReview.remindersSent: Sent reminders for {count} PR(s) requiring review in channel {{channelName}}.
checkReview.threadNotReviewed:
The thread {{threadName}} has not been reviewed:
